name: probe.gl
description: JavaScript Console Instrumentation and Benchmarking for Browser and Node

scripts.build-clean: rm -fr dist dist-es6 && mkdir -p dist dist-es6
scripts.build-size: (echo "dist size" ; find dist/lib -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c) && (echo "dist-es6 size" ; find dist-es6/lib -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c)  && (echo "source size" ; find src/lib -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c)
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-es5 && npm run build-es6 && npm run build-size
scripts.cover: NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter html --reporter cobertura --reporter=lcov npm run test-cover
scripts.lint: eslint src test examples && npm run lint-yarn
scripts.lint-yarn: !(grep -q unpm.u yarn.lock) || (echo 'Please rebuild yarn file using public npmrc' && false)
scripts.publish-prod: npm run test && npm run test-dist && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: npm run test && npm run test-dist && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.test: node test/start.js test && node test/start.js log && npm run build
scripts.test-cover: NODE_ENV=test tape -r babel-register test/node.js && nyc report
